name: Send notifications via Line for filtered Google Sheets rows
description: Stay on top of important updates by automating your notification process. This template allows you to filter specific rows in Google Sheets based on your criteria, and whenever a match is found, Make will send a notification via LINE. Perfect for tracking key data changes or updates in your spreadsheet, this integration ensures you never miss critical information. Set up your Google Sheets with the necessary columns to filter effectively, and streamline your communication with timely alerts on LINE.
